title: FIX Use correct tinymce selection logic
body:
If you select some content and then try to add a link, it should use the text you have selected - but the selection logic wasn't working, so you had to re-enter the text into the link dialog window.

This PR fixes that problem.

## Parent issue
- https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-framework/issues/10369

title: ENH Implement our tinymce skin for tinymce 6
body:
This PR includes commits from https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/pull/1367 - that PR will need to be merged and then any conflicts resolved here before this can be merged.

## Parent issue
- closes #1366

title: ENH Records can be made previewable with an extension
body:
Note: There are currently few if any tests for previewable objects - that will come with https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1306

Requires https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-cms/pull/2779 to be merged in at the same time

See the parent issue for code to test this locally.

## Parent issue
- https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1362

title: POC JQuery 3 support in CMS4
body:
A very dirty way to get JQuery 3 working in CMS 4

## Parent issue
- https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1351

title: ENH Upgrade jquery to 1.12
body:
A slightly different approach from https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/pull/1352

- This approach has updated jquery UI in the thirdparty dir, but has completely removed jquery itself from there in favour of installing it via yarn.
- There are various small changes in src javascript code to resolve bugs - they are not all the best resolutions, this was just a POC to see how far I could get.
- I tried updating entwine from https://github.com/hafriedlander/jquery.entwine but I didn't see any new issues arise or existing issues resolved from doing so - so I reverted back to what was already in admin.
- I manually removed some code from entwine which was causing problems - that code is in both the original and updated versions so updating wouldn't resolve that part.

There are comments in files changed about why some changes were made.

## Parent issue
- https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1351

title: DEP Update thirdparty jQuery libaries
body: Issue https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1351

title: API Migrate SilverStripeNagivator
body:
These classes are useful with `silverstripe/admin` without needing `silverstripe/cms`.

## Parent issue
- https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/issues/1339

title: ENH Open GridField rows in a new tab with Shift/Ctrl/Meta key
body:
There's often a need to keep the GridField context of the current page and open a record from it in a separate tab. Currently it can be achieved with 3 steps:
1) LMC on the row's Actions Menu
2) RMC on "Edit" option
3) pick "Open in new tab" option

Here I suggest letting users use Shift/Ctrl/Meta keys with the left mouse click to open GridField records in a new tab, just like everywhere else.

13.7.0

New Features

Fixes and Enhancements

  • #1647 isFQDN: add allow_wildcard option @​fasenderos

  • #1708 isISO31661Alpha3: perf @​jpaya17

  • #1718 isEmail: replace all dots in GMail length validation @​DasDingGehtNicht

title: ENH Pass form validation result to client
body:
Issue https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-elemental/issues/764

Allows the ValidationResult to be passed to the client as part of a pjax response

Wrapping the JSON in a `<script type="application/json">` is something of a workaround due to the expectation that pjax returns HTML.  If it's not wrapped in a `<script type="application/json">` tag it will fail here https://github.com/silverstripe/silverstripe-admin/blob/1/client/src/legacy/LeftAndMain.js#L775

title: POC Add a trait to bootstrap ViewableData into react component
body:
This Proof of Concept showcase how we could make it easier to for developers to create PHP Objects that maps to react component.

To illustrate this we've created a SiteName ViewableData class to replace the current Site name in the top left corner of the CMS.

# Update 
I spun off the idea into its own repo: https://github.com/maxime-rainville/silverstripe-react/

I have a related recipe that makes it easy to use this in your own project as well: https://github.com/maxime-rainville/recipe-react/

Also have an example form field built using this concept: https://github.com/maxime-rainville/silverstripe-copy-field

title: Make LeftAndMain independent of the presence of Versioned module
body:
LeftAndMain's init() method calls two Versioned methods and this makes it impossible to have the Silverstripe-admin module installed without the Versioned module.

In other parts of the Silverstripe-admin code we have the verification of the presence or absence of the Versioned class, instead in the init() method it is missing.

Please, could you also introduce in the init() method the verification of the presence of the Versioned module in order to install the administrative panel without the Versioned module?

Like in the file commit, for example.

title: REFACTOR: Update CMSProfileController to use required_permission_codes
body:
It appears that CMSProfileController is hardcoded to check for the permission "CMS_ACCESS", but this prevents updating permissions via _config/yaml files.

I've refactored the function to use the same permission login & incorporate the use of $required_permission_codes.

Any feedback welcome.
